name: Legacy: The Lost Pyramid
storyline:
Embark on an epic adventure as an archaeologist searching for your missing brother in an ancient pyramid. Solve challenging riddles and puzzles to uncover clues that will guide you to the next room and bring you closer to finding your brother.
Experience improved graphics, controls, and sound in this revamped version of Legacy: The Lost Pyramid. Immerse yourself in the game's challenging 3D puzzles and put your intelligence to the test.
With every clue you uncover, the mystery deepens. Keep your eyes open and your wits about you to solve the ultimate puzzle and uncover the truth. Do you have what it takes to unravel the secrets of the Lost Pyramid and find your brother? Play now to find out.
summary: You're an archaeologist who sets out on an adventure to find a dear friend who's gone missing in an ancient pyramid. In the pyramid you encounter riddles and puzzles that need to be solved to take you to the next room, and hopefully your friend.
